title: Looking to buy a few Cincinnati T206s to Complete a Team Set
author: timkb

posts.post_title: Looking to buy a few Cincinnati T206s to Complete a Team Set
posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase the following. Tough backs are nice but not required. Looking for decent condition but will consider any condition to complete the set. Thanks for all the help!


Tom DowneyFielding        
Tom DowneyBatting        
Bob Ewing        Follow Thru
Art FrommeThrowing        
Clark GriffithPortrait        
Clark GriffithBatting        
Dick HoblitzellFielding        
Miller HugginsPortrait        
Miller HugginsHands to Mouth

Mike MitchellFielding        
Rebel OakesFielding        
Dode PaskertFielding        
Bob Spade        Portrait
Just completed the Reds set a few months ago! It's a fun one to collect. Good luck!
